title: Football Prediction Algorithm
description: A web app built with Django and React that predicts football match outcomes using recent match standings and statistics. Implements backend logic and interactive frontend UI.

title: Farmer Data Analysis Dashboard
description: A dashboard designed for farmer data reporting using Power BI and Looker Studio. Displays key metrics for agricultural planning and resource tracking.

title: Polygon Cleaning with QGIS
description: Used QGIS for geographic data cleanup, including polygon correction and boundary verification for geospatial datasets.

title: Link Building Blog (AWS Service)
description: A serverless tool hosted on AWS that analyzes and assists in link-building efforts through keyword and competitor data processing.

title: Technical Audit Function (AWS)
description: A backend audit function using AWS Lambda to scan and report on website performance, SEO compliance, and infrastructure status.

title: Competitor Audit Function (AWS)
description: An AWS-based microservice that conducts competitor analysis through scraping and comparison of SEO and content data.

title: Website Analysis Function (AWS)
description: Automated function on AWS that inspects site structure, load speed, keyword targeting, and internal linking for SEO optimization.

title: Keyword Analysis Function (AWS)
description: A cloud-based script hosted on AWS Lambda that identifies high-opportunity keywords for SEO content strategy.

title: Code Generator Function
description: Built with Anaconda and Python, this tool auto-generates starter code based on project parameters. Designed to streamline repetitive scripting tasks.

title: Authentication System
description: Developed a secure authentication system using the Django framework with custom user roles and session management.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio website showcasing technical skills and project work. Built with WordPress and custom styling.
